name: Craft an Iron Axe
rationale: Craft an Iron Axe to chop wood more efficiently and use it as a weapon.
actual: Use a Crafting Table to combine 3 Iron Ingots and 2 Sticks in the correct pattern to make an Iron Axe.

plan.goal: Collect Logs to make Wooden Planks and Sticks
plan.action_nl: Find nearby trees and collect at least 3 logs using your hand or any tool. Convert some of the logs into Wooden Planks and then craft 2 Sticks.
plan.expected: At least 2 sticks are in your inventory.
plan.notes: Logs can come from any tree (Oak, Birch, Spruce). Each log makes 4 planks. Each pair of planks makes 4 sticks.

plan.action_nl: Find and mine at least 3 Iron Ore blocks from caves or hillsides using a Stone Pickaxe.
preconditions: Access to cave or exposed stone area
plan.expected: 3 or more Iron Ore blocks collected.
plan.notes: Iron Ore appears below Y=64. Avoid mining directly down. Bring torches if entering caves.

plan.goal: Smelt Iron Ore into Iron Ingots
plan.action_nl: Use a Furnace to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Ingots using Coal or Charcoal as fuel.
preconditions: At least 1 fuel source (coal, charcoal, or wood)
plan.notes: Each Iron Ore produces one Iron Ingot. One piece of coal can smelt up to 8 items. Use raw material names for smelting - iron_ore not iron_ingot.

plan.action_nl: Use a Crafting Table to combine 3 Iron Ingots and 2 Sticks in an 'L' shape pattern to craft an Iron Axe.
plan.expected: An Iron Axe is added to your inventory.
plan.notes: Place the Iron Ingots in the top-left, top, and middle-left slots, and Sticks in the center and bottom-middle.

plan.goal: Verify and use the Iron Axe
plan.action_nl: Equip the Iron Axe and chop down a tree to confirm it works properly.
plan.expected: You successfully chop a log using the Iron Axe.
plan.notes: The Iron Axe is faster and more durable than wooden or stone tools. Keep it for building and combat.
